-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Albanil"
(
    "idAlbanil" integer NOT NULL,
    "numSegSocial" character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    nombre character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    apellido character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "fechaNacimiento" character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "numeroTelefono" integer,
    "categoriaProfesional" character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "idEmpresa" integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "Albaniles_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("idEmpresa")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Empresa"
(
    "idEmpresa" integer NOT NULL,
    codigo character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    nombre character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    localizacion character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT "Empresa_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("idEmpresa")
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Albanil"
    ADD CONSTRAINT "Albaniles_idEmpresa_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("idEmpresa")
    REFERENCES public."Empresa" ("idEmpresa") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS "Albaniles_pkey"
    ON public."Albanil"("idEmpresa");

END;
